item.title: About
item.description: This is the home of Pankaj Niroula in the web. Pankaj Niroula is a curious explorer and an avid reader of all things fascinating. He likes to explore ideas, thoughts and principles of everything he is exposed to in the world. Particularly, he is passionate about Philosophy, Computer Science and Human Psychology.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to the blog. Here you will find thoughts, ideas and contents that I discover as I live, explore and learn.
